home.slogan: From education to integration - together we shape the future.
home.sloganTranslation: From education to integration - together we shape the future.
home.intro: Mainbildung Förderverein e.V. is a non-profit association based in Würzburg, dedicated to education, integration, and social inclusion. With years of experience in educational work and as a reliable EU project partner, we support migrants, refugees, and disadvantaged groups.

about.title: About Us
about.historyText: Mainbildung Förderverein e.V. was founded with the goal of promoting education and integration. Originally started as an educational institution, we have evolved into an important partner for EU projects.
about.missionText: Our mission is to build bridges between different cultures through education, digital skills, and social inclusion, opening new perspectives for disadvantaged groups.
